EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1562253411.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's voicemail (1562253411.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning Joyce,
I hope all is well. I am wondering if we could continue our conversation about your account with Grand & Toy. Please let me know what day and time would be best to have this discussion with you. I would need approximately 20 minutes of your time. I am looking forward to your response.​ Have a great day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
